includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The story moves on to 1924, when the first ever Labour government heralds a sea change that is felt throughout the nation - nowhere more so than at Downton.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The story moves on to 1924, when the first ever Labour government heralds a sea change that is felt throughout the nation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The story moves on to 1924, when the first ever Labour government heralds a sea change that is felt throughout the nation - nowhere more so than at Downton.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As the house recovers from the dramatic scenes of the previous night, Robert is faced with a difficult decision. Anna becomes Mary's reluctant accomplice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the house recovers from the dramatic scenes of the previous night, Robert is faced with a difficult decision.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the house recovers from the dramatic scenes of the previous night, Robert is faced with a difficult decision. Anna becomes Mary's reluctant accomplice.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Mary's secret assignation is nearly blown, but Violet's quick thinking saves the day. The events surrounding Green's death come under scrutiny once again.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mary's secret assignation is nearly blown, but Violet's quick thinking saves the day. The events surrounding Green's death come under scrutiny once again.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Sarah Bunting continues to cause waves above stairs. Violet reveals to Isobel the surprising truth of her past with Prince Kuragin.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Simon Bricker returns to Downton to discuss the painting with Cora and Inspector Vyner returns with some ominous words of warning for Anna.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Following last week's altercation, relations between Robert and Cora are strained. Edith receives some terrible news and decides to take drastic action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Following last week's altercation, relations between Robert and Cora are strained. Edith receives some terrible news and takes drastic action.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Rose is delighted to introduce Atticus and his parents to her family. Molesley is concerned about Daisy.

includedAssets.title: Downton Abbey 8
includedAssets.synopsis: The storm clouds that have been gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The storm clouds that have been gathering over Anna and Bates finally burst.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: 1924, and the country is rocked by the emergence of a new Labour government. Meanwhile, Mary embarks on a search for love once more.

includedIn.title: Downton Abbey
includedIn.synopsis: An aristocratic family and their servants experience tragedy and triumph against a backdrop of political and social change in early 20th century Yorkshire.
